channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X reportedly bounces back to $44B valuation
item.description: Social media site X’s valuation has bounced back to $44 billion, according to a new report from the Financial Times. Elon Musk purchased the platform,...

item.title: Nvidia Bets Big on Synthetic Data
item.description: Nvidia has acquired synthetic data startup Gretel to bolster the AI training data used by the chip maker's customers and developers.

item.title: Judge orders Citibank to release nonprofit funds, rejects EPA’s arguments
item.description: The judge also found that the nonprofits will “suffer imminent, irreparable harm” if they don’t gain access to their funding. © 2024 TechCrunch. All r...

item.title: After 9 Months in Space, Stranded NASA Astronauts Return Home
item.description: Because of faults with Boeing’s Starliner, Suni Williams and Butch Wilmore had to wait months for a ride back to Earth on a different spacecraft.

item.title: In another good sign for fintech, Ribbit Capital is raising a new $500M fund
item.description: Ribbit Capital is raising $500 million for a new fund, an SEC filing seen by TechCrunch has revealed. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For pers...

item.title: Telegram founder Pavel Durov says app now has 1B users, calls WhatsApp a ‘cheap, watered down imitation’
item.description: Telegram founder Pavel Durov said today that the service now has more than 1 billion active users. This number is up from last year’s reported 950 mil...

item.title: OpenAI’s Deep Research Agent Is Coming for White-Collar Work
item.description: The research-focused agent shows how a new generation of more capable AI models could automate some office tasks.

item.title: 23 Best Vinyl Accessories (2025): Cleaning Gear, Mats, Displays, and More
item.description: From record cleaners to mats, these extras are for budding enthusiasts and die-hard collectors alike.

item.title: Dyson Car+Boat Handheld Vacuum Review: Powerful and Compact
item.description: Dyson’s latest vacuum is powerful and compact but feels redundant.

item.title: xAI launches an API for generating images
item.description: Elon Musk’s AI company, xAI, has added image generation capabilities to its API. Only one model is available in the API at the moment, “grok-2-image-1...
